section.p: This section provides details on installing the Messaging service for the Development Platform.

body.section:
PrerequisitesInstalling services requires that the HDP Installer 2.0, also known as HDPI, has already been installed.
The images for the individual services will be downloaded when the service installation is started. A separate download step is not necessary.
The installer retrieves service configuration information from the clouds.yaml file. If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you can create one now.

section.title: Install the Messaging Service
section.note: For help with the installer, enter the command openstack hdpi -help

ol.li: Create a new user with the Messaging Admin role; credentials for the user+tenant where the service is to be deployed.
download the HDN package into swift.
SSH to the HP Helion OpenStack Deployer.
If you did not create a clouds.yaml file earlier, you must create one now.
Run the installer. openstack hdpi messaging install --package wscatalog.

After the installation is complete, launch the Messaging deployer. $ openstack hdpi messaging launchThe output should look similar to the following:Searching for container msgaas-deployer... Searching for container msgaas-launcher... Extracting ... Running scripts... Running launcher.py
....
